"You've got problems of your own, Autobot!" Devilcat warns as he 
dives to the attack, firing energy bursts from his laser sword.  It's 
the Rogue leader's general strategy to take his opponents on one or 
two at a time, as his energy shield can generally fend off anything a 
single robot can dish out - with some exceptions, of course.

OOC: Before anyone starts complaining, aren't the villains SUPPOSED 
to be more powerful than the heroes in a straight-up fight?!?
